title: 旧约 - 约伯记(Job) - 第 18 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 约伯记(Job) -- 第 18 章 ( 本篇共有 42 章 )

lineList.en: Then answered Bildad the Shuhite, and said,
lineList.cn: 书亚人比勒达回答说，

lineList.en: How long will it be ere ye make an end of words? mark, and afterwards we will speak.
lineList.cn: 你寻索言语要到几时呢。你可以揣摩思想，然后我们就说话。

lineList.en: Wherefore are we counted as beasts, and reputed vile in your sight?
lineList.cn: 我们为何算为畜生，在你眼中看作污秽呢。

lineList.en: He teareth himself in his anger: shall the earth be forsaken for thee? and shall the rock be removed out of his place?
lineList.cn: 你这恼怒将自己撕裂的，难道大地为你见弃，磐石挪开原处吗。

lineList.en: Yea, the light of the wicked shall be put out, and the spark of his fire shall not shine.
lineList.cn: 恶人的亮光必要熄灭。他的火焰必不照耀。

lineList.en: The light shall be dark in his tabernacle, and his candle shall be put out with him.
lineList.cn: 他帐棚中的亮光要变为黑暗。他以上的灯也必熄灭。

lineList.en: The steps of his strength shall be straitened, and his own counsel shall cast him down.
lineList.cn: 他坚强的脚步必见狭窄。自己的计谋必将他绊倒。

lineList.en: For he is cast into a net by his own feet, and he walketh upon a snare.
lineList.cn: 因为他被自己的脚陷入网中，走在缠人的网罗上。

lineList.en: The gin shall take him by the heel, and the robber shall prevail against him.
lineList.cn: 圈套必抓住他的脚跟。机关必擒获他。

lineList.en: The snare is laid for him in the ground, and a trap for him in the way.
lineList.cn: 活扣为他藏在土内。羁绊为他藏在路上。

lineList.en: Terrors shall make him afraid on every side, and shall drive him to his feet.
lineList.cn: 四面的惊吓要使他害怕，并且追赶他的脚跟。

lineList.en: His strength shall be hungerbitten, and destruction shall be ready at his side.
lineList.cn: 他的力量必因饥饿衰败，祸患要在他旁边等候。

lineList.en: It shall devour the strength of his skin: even the firstborn of death shall devour his strength.
lineList.cn: 他本身的肢体要被吞吃，死亡的长子要吞吃他的肢体。

lineList.en: His confidence shall be rooted out of his tabernacle, and it shall bring him to the king of terrors.
lineList.cn: 他要从所倚靠的帐棚被拔出来，带到惊吓的王那里。

lineList.en: It shall dwell in his tabernacle, because it is none of his: brimstone shall be scattered upon his habitation.
lineList.cn: 不属他的必住在他的帐棚里。硫磺必撒在他所住之处。

lineList.en: His roots shall be dried up beneath, and above shall his branch be cut off.
lineList.cn: 下边，他的根本要枯乾。上边，他的枝子要剪除。

lineList.en: His remembrance shall perish from the earth, and he shall have no name in the street.
lineList.cn: 他的记念在地上必然灭亡。他的名字在街上也不存留。

lineList.en: He shall be driven from light into darkness, and chased out of the world.
lineList.cn: 他必从光明中被撵到黑暗里，必被赶出世界。

lineList.en: He shall neither have son nor nephew among his people, nor any remaining in his dwellings.
lineList.cn: 在本民中必无子无孙。在寄居之地也无一人存留。

lineList.en: They that come after him shall be astonied at his day, as they that went before were affrighted.
lineList.cn: 以后来的要惊奇他的日子，好像以前去的受了惊骇。

lineList.en: Surely such are the dwellings of the wicked, and this is the place of him that knoweth not God.
lineList.cn: 不义之人的住处总是这样。此乃不认识神之人的地步。
